short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a QR Code out of this page for transferring to another device/computer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to instantly generate a QR code of the URL of the current website to easily transfer what you're browsing to your phone.
